sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Calendar, User, CheckCircle, Shield, Users, Layers, ArrowRight, MousePointer } from 'lucide-react'; const LandingPage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = useState(window.innerWidth < 768); useEffect(() => { const handleResize = () => setIsMobile(window.innerWidth < 768); window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); return () => window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); }, []); const styles = { container: { fontFamily: "'Inter', sans-serif", overflowX: 'hidden' }, // --- HERO SECTION --- heroSection: { position: 'relative', height: '60vh', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', textAlign: 'center', color: '#fff', backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,0.5), rgba(0,0,0,0.5)), url("https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1540575467063-178a50c2df87?w=1600&q=80")', backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center' }, heroContent: { maxWidth: '800px', padding: '20px', zIndex: 2 }, heroTitle: { fontSize: isMobile ? '8vw' : '3vw', fontWeight: '800', marginBottom: '10px', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: '1px' }, heroSubtitle: { fontSize: isMobile ? '4vw' : '1.2vw', marginBottom: '30px', fontWeight: '300', opacity: 0.9 }, ctaBtn: { padding: '12px 30px', fontSize: '1rem', fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#fff', backgroundColor: '#f97316', border: 'none', borderRadius: '4px', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.2s', textTransform: 'uppercase' }, // --- BLUE STRIP --- blueStrip: { backgroundColor: '#2563eb', color: '#fff', padding: '15px', textAlign: 'center', fontSize: isMobile ? '3.5vw' : '1vw', fontWeight: '600', letterSpacing: '1px', textTransform: 'uppercase' }, // --- FEATURES GRID (Icons) --- featuresSection: { padding: isMobile ? '40px 20px' : '60px 10vw', backgroundColor: '#f8fafc', textAlign: 'center' }, grid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: isMobile ? '1fr' : 'repeat(4, 1fr)', gap: '30px', marginTop: '40px' }, featureCard: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center', gap: '15px' }, iconCircle: { width: '70px', height: '70px', borderRadius: '50%', backgroundColor: '#fff', border: '2px solid #2563eb', color: '#2563eb', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', fontSize: '24px', boxShadow: '0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.05)' }, featureTitle: { fontWeight: '700', fontSize: '1rem', color: '#1e293b', textTransform: 'uppercase', marginBottom: '5px' }, featureDesc: { fontSize: '0.9rem', color: '#64748b', lineHeight: '1.5', maxWidth: '250px' }, learnMoreBtn: { marginTop: '15px', padding: '8px 20px', backgroundColor: '#0ea5e9', color: '#fff', border: 'none', borderRadius: '4px', fontSize: '0.8rem', fontWeight: 'bold', cursor: 'pointer' }, // --- ROLE INFO SECTION --- roleSection: { padding: isMobile ? '40px 20px' : '80px 15vw', backgroundColor: '#fff' }, roleHeader: { textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: '50px' }, roleGrid: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: isMobile ? 'column' : 'row', gap: '40px' }, // Role Card roleCard: { flex: 1, padding: '40px', borderRadius: '15px', backgroundColor: '#fff', boxShadow: '0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)', border: '1px solid #e2e8f0', position: 'relative', overflow: 'hidden' }, roleBadge: (bg) => ({ position: 'absolute', top: '20px', right: '20px', backgroundColor: bg, color: '#fff', padding: '5px 15px', borderRadius: '20px', fontSize: '0.8rem', fontWeight: 'bold', textTransform: 'uppercase' }), roleTitle: { fontSize: '1.8rem', fontWeight: '800', marginBottom: '20px', color: '#1e293b' }, list: { listStyle: 'none', padding: 0, margin: 0 }, listItem: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'start', gap: '10px', marginBottom: '15px', color: '#475569', fontSize: '0.95rem', lineHeight: '1.6' }, // Login Buttons Area loginArea: { marginTop: '30px', paddingTop: '20px', borderTop: '1px solid #e2e8f0', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '10px' }, loginBtn: (color, bg) => ({ width: '100%', padding: '12px', borderRadius: '8px', border: 'none', backgroundColor: bg, color: color, fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize: '1rem', cursor: 'pointer', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', gap: '10px', transition: 'transform 0.1s' }), footer: { backgroundColor: '#1e293b', color: '#94a3b8', padding: '40px 20px', textAlign: 'center', fontSize: '0.9rem' } }; return (
{/* 1. HERO SECTION */}

EventSphere

CUSTOMIZED WITH YOU IN MIND.
Comprehensive event services tailored to impress every time.

{/* 2. BLUE STRIP */}
Customized options that are not only what you want — but exactly what you need
{/* 3. FEATURES GRID */}

Easy Selection

Browse through various events categorized by department, interest, and type.

Smart Management

A centralized dashboard to manage registrations, tickets, and approvals efficiently.

Secure Logistics

Robust authentication for students and teachers ensures secure data handling.

Event Marketing

Keep your attendees updated with branded, personalized communications.

{/* 4. ROLES INFO (Student vs Teacher) */}

Who is it for?

Tailored features for every user on campus.

{/* STUDENT CARD */}
For Students
Student Portal
  • Browse Events: Access a full calendar of upcoming workshops, seminars, and cultural fests.
  • One-Click Register: Sign up instantly without paperwork.
  • Track Status: See real-time updates (Pending, Approved, Rejected) in "My Tickets".
  • Digital Profile: Manage your academic details and participation history.
{/* TEACHER CARD */}
For Teachers
Teacher Portal
  • Create Events: Launch new events with images, dates, and descriptions in minutes.
  • Control Registrations: Approve or reject student requests with a single click.
  • Live Analytics: View total participants and pending requests on your dashboard.
  • Manage Workflow: Edit event details or cancel events seamlessly.
{/* FOOTER */}
EventSphere

© 2024 EventSphere College Management. All rights reserved.

Privacy Policy Terms of Service Contact Support
); }; export default LandingPage;
